function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low percentage of trials published and results available","Impact":"Limited evidence for COVID-19 trials, hindering research and decision-making","Mitigation":"Encourage and incentivize data sharing, enforce legal requirements for data sharing","Technologies":"Data management systems, data sharing platforms","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals, policymakers","Owner":"Government, research institutions, ethics committees"},{"Description":"Absence of centralized, sponsor-driven primary data sharing","Impact":"Difficulty in accessing comprehensive data for COVID-19 research","Mitigation":"Establish centralized data sharing mechanisms, incentivize sponsors to share data","Technologies":"Centralized data platforms, data sharing agreements","People":"Research sponsors, regulatory agencies, research institutions","Owner":"Government, regulatory agencies"},{"Description":"Multifaceted reasons for non-data sharing, including unawareness of legal requirements and language barriers","Impact":"Undermines transparency, hinders data accessibility and analysis","Mitigation":"Education and training on legal requirements, language support for diverse researchers, oversight and enforcement","Technologies":"Educational resources, language translation tools, compliance monitoring systems","People":"Researchers, institutions, regulatory agencies","Owner":"Ethics committees, regulatory agencies"}]}
